text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hayahide… and Taishin? Why are you two here? Ah, were you two invited to the party as well?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Nah, that's not why…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: We're here for our own Christmas party. I didn't think we would be in the same venue, however… What incredible odds.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh, so that's why! You two are throwing a party… Huh? You two…? Aren't you… missing someone?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah, are you wondering about Ticket? She's bedridden with a cold right now, despite this party being her idea.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That is… unfortunate. She was probably so excited for it too. You two are probably feeling lonely without her as well.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Not at all. Anyways, why are we always being lumped in as "those 3" anyways…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I do not mind it one bit. Anyways, Oguri-san, as Taishin said, we are not lonely whatsoever. That's because she promised us.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She said "I'll recover through sheer fighting spirit…" That being said, if it's her, I truly feel like she can make miracles happen through her spirit alone.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see… Well I guess if you're that energetic, you can cure a cold in no time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I agree. So we decided we would come early and prepare for the party while waiting for Ticket to show up.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey… Haven't we talked enough? Oguri-san rushed out of there after all. Seemed like she had something to do.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …! That's right, I have to find a present, quick!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A present…? From you, Oguri-san?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I wanted to give a Christmas present to the people organizing today's party.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But I was so busy thinking about the delicious feast, and before I knew it the day of the party was here…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: People actually do that?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I know! Hayahide, you understood how I felt before, right? You're super smart. Would you mind lending me some of that wisdom!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Of course, I would love to help you… First, Oguri-san, would you mind telling me what kind of present you were thinking of getting them?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Well… I want to give them something that will make them happy, glad, excited… A present that will bring them happiness!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I admire your drive, however, it is somewhat lacking in specificity. Hmm…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Then… Why not try deciding based on past experiences?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Past experiences…?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes. Oguri-san, what kind of presents have made you the most excited and delighted in the past?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: … There is one…!! I remember! It was when I was still a child…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That year I was planning on running in a sprinting competition. If I won, I was going to ask Santa-san to bring me a carrot.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But I was so preoccupied with training for the competition… I totally forgot to write a letter to Santa-san! And yet…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: There was something under the tree when I got home after winning the competition… A letter saying "congratulations on first place" and lots of carrots were there!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: How did he know without me even writing to him? I thought that maybe my mother told him, but I didn't tell anyone about what I wanted for Christmas…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I was so surprised that day, and it showed just how amazing Santa-san is… I think that that was the most joyful Christmas I have ever had.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Wait, so that means… If I become Santa, I'll be able to know what everyone wants most? Should I go looking for a flying reindeer first!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No, I don't think that is what that means… Although, it would be a great idea to try and think about it from Santa's perspective.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san, what we need is the one thing that you could give that would make all of your fans happy. I know for a fact that the answer to that is somewhere inside of you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Inside of me…? Ah, I think I got it! I'll think a little bit harder! Taishin, thank you for listening to me as well!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ah… I have a feeling she misunderstood you… This feeling of unpredictability… I'm getting deja vu.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe. They do have some similarities in their straightforward personalities.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Anyways, that story about Santa… that was definitely her mom, right? Oguri-san's real easy to read, so she could probably tell that she wanted carrots.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That is likely. However, since we do not know for sure that it was her mother, it would be foolish for us to tell her that.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wonder if Oguri-san will be able to find the right "present…" Maybe it would have been better to have talked a little bit more.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You're meddling too much… She'll be fi… Achoo! It's cold… Let's get inside already. We've gotta start preparing for the party anyways.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That is true. We will surprise Ticket by having it ready by night time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Since it's her, she will definitely have a miracle happen on this holy night. More importantly, if she does not show, we will have too much excess food.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hah? You prepared the food as well? I did think you brought a lot of luggage…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You told me I didn't need to bring anything… I figured we'd make everything here…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Of course I still have things for you to do, like decorating the room. Do not worry, I'll have you do Ticket's portion as well.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Anyways, it is getting quite cold. The forecast said it would be a sunny day today… Well, I'll keep my eye on the weather.
